Blog.post: urlLink What Finding Nemo Character are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Well this sounds like me, and this is the final quiz, honestly!

You have a mysterious kiss. Your partner never knows what you're going to come up with next; this creates great excitement and arousal never knowing what to expect. And it's sure to end in a kiss as great as your mystery. urlLink What kind of kiss are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla ooooh, exciting!!

French Guard I'm French! Why do think I have this outrageous accent, you silly king-a?! urlLink What Monty Python Character are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Bring it!! lol. isnt monty python fab!! pat quinn is in themeaning of life whop (ps pat quinn in magenta from rocky horror if you didnt no:P)
Good morning folks! how is everyone today??

i should be working :P shhh!! ok just thought i would post to say hi to colin as he is the first to coment, im so happy i now know how this site works, whoop to me! so how is every one? it would be great to get more replys from people!! take care, until tomorrow!!

have decided that this is what im going to talk about first :D ive just done this quiz and this was my result: YOU ARE A ROCKY GOD! You know this movie, you could dress up as Frankie, and pull it off in style! You can recite the whole damn movie and sing every friggin song! YOU KICK ASS!! urlLink Whats your Rocky Horror IQ? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla take it and see what you get!! post a reply please!!!

ok i have finally worked out what i am doing, so lets start again, Greetings traveler! welcome to my blog page. Im not sure what to wrrite about, so if you would like to talk about any of the following, please do :D Kayaking Absieling Climbing Movies ROCKY HORROR!! Fire -burn baby burn! Music If you cant reply to this then i will have to rethink the use of this site :D
Ok, so im not sure what im doing, i wil post this, find out whats going on, cry, then pull myself together and enjoy the site!lol

well long time no speak, ive just had to wait 30mins for this page to load, and i bet im about to be kicked offline now, lol. Soooo, what have i been up to? well ive had exams, whooooooooop. can you sence the sarcasim? but on the up side ive been a love guru! yey go me, and go you two! you know who you are! rather anoyed with the internet at the mo, being soooo slow, but i think it is beacuse i am downloading a song. whoops.lol OK new news!! may have found a film better than rocky, shock shock horror horror! ive just found Hedwig and the Angry Inch, fantastic film! and great writing by John Camerron Mitchell and Stephen Trask, well done chucks!! ok dont no what else to say, but i hope i get some comments! take care folks!

You are a GRAMMAR GOD ! If your mission in life is not already to preserve the English tongue, it should be. Congratulations and thank you! urlLink How grammatically sound are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla You heard the quiz! i am GOD!! heehee
aaah long time no speak, and this time i bring you gifts of quiz results! lol!! urlLink urlLink Which Rocky character are you? ok i promise this is the last! for today :D
back again, ive just found a rather extrodinary site!! http://www.geocities.com/fang_club/Misc_index.html monty python rocks!!! heeheee clicky clicky cliky!!!!!

Its almost a month since i last posted!! tut tut! so, i bet you are all wondering what i have been up to, well..... a whole pile of nothing, and ive got another 8weeks of nothingness piles. GREAT! but on the upside ive found some great news!! The legend that is Time Curry is going to join the Monty Python crew, well what is left of them. RIP guys! To do a broadway production of Monty Pythons search for the holy grail. it will be entitled Spamalot! loveing the name!! and that will be out in america, *groan* hopefully coming to the uk in 2005!! whoop. Also, if you have not seen Shrek 2, what are you doing!! DROP EVERYTHING AND GO, NOW! OI, YOU AT THE BACK, MOVE!!! GOOOOOOO!!! heeheee its possibly going to over taking my love of rocky and hedwig, shock shock horror!! Ok i dont have much else to ramble about so i shall sign off and hopefully add more before next month, heehee!!

greetings, long time to post! gawdamit, ive got to get better than this! so would you like to know what i have been up to lately? Are you sitting comfortably? then i shal begin.... A whole pile of nothingness, well i lie, i have been working, which is fun, but getting up at 8.00 every morning is not! i have made a forum: urlLink http://phantompixie.suddenlaunch3.com/index.cgi please click and join! lots of fun and laughs!! and it gets a bit lonely talking to myself! Until next month......
